item.source: RS2PK - Beautiful HD, Smooth Combat, Old School & New School Data Modes

item.title: RS2PK - Beautiful HD, Smooth Combat, Old School & New School Data Modes
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

More Updates

Melee is now stronger against NPCs Combat timer is now faster (all combat delayed had 1 extra tick due to programming error) Dungeoneering lobby has been selected (coming soon) NPC drops now work on a ep based drop system instead of being completely random Drops are now a lot less common but are guaranteed after a while Godwars boss aggression is fixed You can now click auto retaliate in the staff sidebar interface 602 home teleport fixed Npc aggression will now time out 8 minutes after a region change and won't be aggressive (except GWD bosses) You will no longer DC if you don't have fishing bait when clicking the spot Fishing spots that require bait now work properly Altar at corp now works Adventure log will now display your level for experience instead of your current boosted/drained level You can now remove items from trade Daisies no longer prevent melee if your on them Cooking burn rate has been reduced Dropping items now stop actions you are performing You can no longer drop items of value while in wilderness combat Freeze timer is now cut in half if opponent is using protect from magic You can now fletch logs into unstrung shortbows Lvl 180 fight caves npc attack animation corrected Mithril dragons now have a ranged attack Rune thrownaxe now works

Read full topic
